author: cnbc.com
title: Adobe to Webcast Q1 FY2018 Earnings Conference Call
text:
SAN JOSE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) today announced it will webcast its first quarter fiscal year 2018 earnings conference call to be held later this week.
What: Adobe First Quarter Fiscal Year 2018 Earnings Conference Call When: 2 p.m. Pacific Time, Thursday, March 15, 2018 Where: www.adobe.com/ADBE
How: Live over the Internet; simply connect to the meeting room on the webpage above Questions: Contact Adobe Investor Relations at 408-536-4416 or ir@adobe.com
The live webcast will last for approximately one hour. Firewalls designed to protect corporate information can prevent access to the webcast. On personal computers, participating in the live webcast via Adobe Connect requires Adobe Flash Player version 10 or later. On supported smartphones and tablets, Adobe Connect Mobile is required for access to the live webcast. An archive of the call will be made available for approximately 45 days.
Adobe uses its website as a channel of distribution of material company information. Financial, product and other material information regarding Adobe is routinely posted on and accessible at www.adobe.com or www.adobe.com/ADBE .
About Adobe
Adobe is changing the world through digital experiences. For more information, visit www.adobe.com .
